dialog.text: Hi, there. The seeker  is soundless. The supporter could tell the seeker to talk to someone about her feelings. The supporter could also ask the seeker to seek professional therapy.
Hello, how are you?

Yeah, I'm not doing very good. I lost my job about 4 months ago and I'm looking for some assistance. The seeker  feels lost and struggling to find help. The supporter could provide some helpful tips like finding a study group or finding a support group.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I can understand how frustrating that can be.
beam_texts: I'm so sorry to hear that. I can understand how frustrating that can be.

dialog.text: Yeah, it is really hard. The seeker  is crying because she is struggling in her job. The supporter could give some tips on how to cope with the crying.
I know it's hard, but try to think of this as a time for self care. Do you have any hobbies or do any self care now that you're unemployed?
beam_texts: I know it's hard, but try to think of this as a time for self care. Do you have any hobbies or do any self care now that you're unemployed?

dialog.text: I've been trying to do that, but my anxiety is getting worse and worse. I don't have any hobbies that I can do at this point. The seeker  feels overwhelmed and can't find the time to do anything fun. The supporter could say something like "I have a lot of fun activities that I like that you might find interesting" or "There are a lot of things in life that make you happy that make you not happy before."
I understand. It's been hard for me to find new hobbies too, since I've been working from home. Have your co-workers noticed any changes in you?
beam_texts: I understand. It's been hard for me to find new hobbies too, since I've been working from home. Have your co-workers noticed any changes in you?

dialog.text: They have, but I don't think that's because of my anxiety. The seeker  feels overwhelmed and cannot find any Serenity. The supporter could ask the seeker to find self-care activities.
I have also had anxiety in the past when it came to finding new hobbies, but I found that talking to my co-workers and finding some common ground was a great way to start.
beam_texts: I have also had anxiety in the past when it came to finding new hobbies, but I found that talking to my co-workers and finding some common ground was a great way to start.

dialog.text: That's a good idea. Maybe I should try to find some hobbies that are more solo activities. The seeker  feels overwhelmed and anxious. The supporter could suggest the seeker to try find hobbies that are self only and do not involve working.
I think that would definitely help! What are some things you like to do?
beam_texts: I think that would definitely help! What are some things you like to do?

dialog.text: I like to read. I've been reading a lot of books about self-improvement, like the Power of Habit. The seeker  is trying to find hobbies that are outside of work. The supporter could help the seeker to find hobbies that are outside of work and help the seeker to find something to do with the self.
That's great! I also like to read. I recently read "The Power of Habit" and it really helped me too!
beam_texts: That's great! I also like to read. I recently read "The Power of Habit" and it really helped me too!

dialog.text: I'll have to check that one out. I'm also trying to learn how to make new friends. The seeker  is trying to learn how to make new friends. The supporter could offer the seeker some social activities to do for new friends.
It's a great book! It talks a lot about how our minds work and how to change how we see things..
beam_texts: It's a great book! It talks a lot about how our minds work and how to change how we see things..

dialog.text: I think that's really important. I'm not sure I'm good at seeing things from other people's perspectives. The seeker  feels like learning how to make new friends is a burden because she doesn't know how to see people's perspectives. The supporter could help the seeker by telling her that she can start making friends by reading books about social media and social climbers.
I understand that it can be difficult to see things from other people's perspectives, but I know you can do it!.
beam_texts: I understand that it can be difficult to see things from other people's perspectives, but I know you can do it!.

dialog.text: I'm trying. It's not easy. The seeker  feels overwhelmed and struggling with finding new hobbies. The supporter could help the seeker by providing ideas for how to improve the seeker's hobbies. The supporter could also provide helpful advice for how to overcome the anxiety around the exams.
I think that you seem like a very positive person and I appreciate how hard things must be for you right now.
beam_texts: I think that you seem like a very positive person and I appreciate how hard things must be for you right now.

dialog.text: Thank you. I try to be positive. It's hard sometimes. The seeker  is positive and helpful. The supporter could tell the seeker that she needs to be positive more when she feels struggling.
I think that you being seeker is a great start and I am sure that you will find your way through this.
beam_texts: I think that you being seeker is a great start and I am sure that you will find your way through this.

dialog.text: Thank you. I really hope so. The seeker  is positive and happy. The supporter could tell the seeker that she or he has started a positive journey.
I am sure that you will. Have a good night!
